title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Developing Digital Self-Directed Nursing Learners: Haptic-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously resolve over 80% of non-routine nursing scenarios using digital tools in VR simulation environments.
Learners can demonstrate metacognitive and self-assessment competencies through reflective journaling twice weekly.
Learners can revise and improve nursing decision-making processes twice or more based on peer assessment feedback, demonstrating double-loop learning abilities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
